snippet: In this bromantic comedy, Mr. Black’s character wants Mr. Marsden’s to attend their high school reunion, but he gets a great deal more.
abstract: Manohla Dargis reviews movie The D Train, written and directed by Jarrad Paul and Andrew Mogel and starring Jack Black and James Marsden.
lead_paragraph: In this bromantic comedy, Mr. Black’s character wants Mr. Marsden’s to attend their high school reunion, but he gets a great deal more.

headline.main: Review: In ‘The D Train,’ Jack Black and James Marsden in a Steamy Bromance
headline.print_headline: Please Show Up at the High School Reunion. I’ll Do Anything.
